Reviews.Content: value money luxury hotel nice clean comfortable hotel value money booked park cruise package hotel stayed night clean comfortable parked car cruise duration hotel provided free shuttle cruiseport pleasant experience

Reviews.Title: “Cars commonly burglarized in area”

Reviews.Content: dont victim cars commonly burglarized 3 parking spots entrance lights security camera plenty nice hotels hotel district avoid happy call police absolutely else worth risk 1200 car repair converter cut underneath car avoid hotel safe travels

Reviews.Title: “Nothing special, But Close to Airport, Light Rail”
Reviews.Author: Railroadguy
Reviews.Content: 2nd 3rd stay close light rail station hotel outdated facelift clean quiet staff helpful easy access 695 free shuttle airport resteraunts near except fast food streetit served stay relax train city evening bars dining

Reviews.Title: “Adequate at best. Showing signs of wear. Questionable area”

Reviews.Content: time property unfortunately property signs wear lack care threadbare carpet dirty hallways marred elevators lack maintenance adequate money bed fine pillows expected notice front desk vehicle theft makes uneasy rough didn’t rate 610 im worse properties fairfield hampton hi express level property lame breakfast

Reviews.Content: finding sleeping airport floor paying stay hotel opted spend money bed id stranded city id midnight honestly idea doing id reserved hotel staff answered rookie questions try advantage lack hotel knowledge mediocre 5 hours sleep complaints hear outside makes peaceful sleep unless course youre sleep deprived fall asleep rock concert additionally comfortable beds awkwardly tiny pillows

Reviews.Title: “ABSOLUTELY ATTROCIOUS”

Reviews.Content: stay sleep inn terrible hotel terrible management service messed hotel reservations failed provide arrangements notified mess ups rip reserved suite hotel months arrival informed unavailable suites complaining accommodate overall terrible

Reviews.Title: “Avoid Sleep Inn at all cost!”

Reviews.Content: carpet filthy dirty air conditioner unit falling apart nonsmoking smelled smoke suspect bed bugs bitten upper arm night hotel blackout lasted hour half 1030pm continental breakfast lacking eggs waffles bananas citrus fruit breads cold hot packaged cereals juice milk coffee tea hotel staff nonchalant

Reviews.Title: “Solid option if traveling in/out of BWI”
Reviews.Author: fjnovak1
Reviews.Content: stayed night arriving late flight baltimore morning meeting attend hotel eight nine hours besides hallway corridors abnormally warm real complaints shuttle slow coming airport gathered construction midnight pretty standard youve stayed sleep inn bed comfy nice walkin shower safe quiet else pretty basic continental breakfast morning okay special wouldnt return perfectly decent 2 12 star airport hotel
